q_en: Have all of John's orders been completed?

steps.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_orders, SUM(CASE WHEN ot.status = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS completed_orders FROM orders ot JOIN customers c ON ot.user_id = c.id WHERE c.customer_name = 'John';
steps.description: To check if John's orders have been completed, we need to count the number of orders placed by John and check how many of them have a completed status.
